title: Text to Image Generation with Diffusion Based Models

definitions.Diffusion Process: Just as we viewed the molecule's motion as a Gaussian-distributed noise
definitions.Gaussian-distributed noise: We add a Gaussian-distributed noise to the pixel

summary: The slide explains the diffusion process in text to image generation using diffusion-based models. It describes how a molecule's motion is viewed as Gaussian-distributed noise and how this noise is added to a pixel to create movement in the image.
